unilim.projet.ponk

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • unilim.projet.ponk.GameView

  • public class GameView
extends SurfaceView
    View of the game, extends SurfaceView, host the GameThread which compute the model
    Author:
    Nivtitif
